headline: Show HN: A game fully contained in a link
description:
Hey HN, I made https://linkians.com which is a game where all the action and state is contained in the url. The game involves taking care of little pets (emojis) that live in your url bar. Kind of like tamagotchi or sims. Feed them, play with them, and watch out for enemies!

There's no server, just emojis in the url and client-side logic. Any linkians url using the supported emojis is a valid game state so you can save your game, or type out your own url and send it to a friend.

I'd appreciate any feedback.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 完全包含在一个链接中的游戏
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 完全包含在一個鏈接中的遊戲
description_zh-Hans:
嘿，HN，我做了https://linkians.com，这是一个游戏，所有的动作和状态都包含在url中。这个游戏涉及照顾住在你的网址栏里的小宠物（表情符号）。有点像tamagotchi或sims。喂它们，和它们一起玩，并注意敌人！

没有服务器，只有url中的表情符号和客户端的逻辑。任何使用支持的表情符号的链接网址都是有效的游戏状态，所以你可以保存你的游戏，或者输入你自己的网址并发送给朋友。
